mapper.select: select trainer_name as trainerName from trainer

/* UserMapper.selectTrainerByTrainerId */ select trainer_id , trainer_name , trainer_email , trainer_phone , trainer_ci_no , trainer_fcm_token , trainer_sns_kind , trainer_status , center_id from trainer where trainer_id = #{trainerId}

/* UserMapper.selectTermsForJoin */ select a.terms_id,a.terms_kind,a.terms_essential_yn , case when a.terms_essential_yn = 'Y' then concat('(필수) ',a.terms_title) else concat('(선택) ',a.terms_title) end as terms_title , b.file_url as terms_url from terms a left join file b on a.file_group_id = b.file_group_id where a.terms_state = 'ING'

with ticket_info_view as ( select a.member_id as memberId, b.ticket_id as ticketId, a.member_name as memberName, c.trainer_product_name as productName, COALESCE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, STR_TO_DATE(b.ticket_start_date, '%Y%m%d'), STR_TO_DATE(b.ticket_end_date, '%Y%m%d')), 0) as productMonth, COALESCE(c.trainer_product_count, 0) as productTotalCnt, COALESCE(c.trainer_product_count - b.ticket_use_cnt, 0) as productRemainCnt, b.ticket_start_date as ticketStartDate, b.ticket_end_date as ticketEndDate, COALESCE(sum(if(d.reservation_status = 'SIGN', 1, 0)), 0) as attendanceCnt, COALESCE(sum(if(d.reservation_status = 'NOSHOW', 1, 0)), 0) as absenceCnt, b.ticket_code as ticketCode from member a inner join ticket b on a.member_id = b.member_id and b.ticket_delete_yn = 'N' left join trainer_product c on b.trainer_product_id = c.trainer_product_id left join reservation d on b.ticket_id = d.ticket_id and d.reservation_status in ('SIGN', 'NOSHOW') and d.reservation_delete_yn = 'N' where a.member_id = #{memberId} group by b.ticket_id ) select tiv.memberId, tiv.ticketId, tiv.memberName, tiv.productName, tiv.productMonth, tiv.productTotalCnt, tiv.productRemainCnt, tiv.ticketStartDate, tiv.ticketEndDate, tiv.attendanceCnt, tiv.absenceCnt, tiv.ticketCode from ticket_info_view tiv where case when (select count(*) from ticket_info_view) > 1 then STR_TO_DATE(tiv.ticketEndDate, '%Y%m%d') >= CURDATE() else 1=1 end;

/* UserMapper.selectTrainerSettlementByTrainerSettlementId */ select trainer_settlement_id , trainer_settlement_percent , trainer_settlement_code , center_id , trainer_id from trainer_settlement where trainer_settlement_id = #{trainerSettlementId}

/* UserMapper.selectCenterJoinByTrainerId */ select a.center_id , c.center_group_id , b.center_name , a.center_join_main_yn from center_join a left join center b on a.center_id = b.center_id left join center_group c on b.center_group_id = c.center_group_id where a.center_join_approval_yn = 'Y' and b.center_delete_yn = 'N' and a.trainer_id = #{trainerId}
